title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power solution for your vehicle. With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter can start up to 10.0L diesel engines and any gasoline engines in just minutes. Equipped with a 27800mAh high capacity and portable battery charger, it can be used anywhere with its compact body.

Safety is our top priority, which is why this jump starter is designed with intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection. The sturdy and durable metal clamps ensure reliable performance, while the sufficient cable length provides convenience.

Not only is this a jump starter, but it also doubles as a portable car power supply with its 27800mAh capacity. It features dual USB 3.0 output ports, allowing for fast charging of almost all USB devices. Charge your mobile phones, tablets, cameras, and more with 75% faster charging speed than ordinary power banks.

In addition, this jump starter is equipped with a multifunctional LED light that offers three working modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe. Whether you're camping, outdoors, or facing an emergency, this flashlight will provide the necessary illumination.

With your purchase, you'll receive the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and a user manual. Our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is also available to assist you with any issues. Please note that no adapter is included, but any USB type charger for your cell phone can be used to charge the jump starter.

Don't let a dead battery leave you stranded. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the power and convenience it offers.

With a powerful 4000A peak current, this jump starter can effortlessly start any 10.0L diesel engine or gasoline engine in just minutes. This jump starter is not only powerful, but also incredibly safe. It features intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection, ensuring a worry-free jump start every time. The sturdy and durable metal clamps and long cables add convenience and reliability to your jump-starting experience.

But that's not all - the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is also a high-capacity portable power supply. With dual USB 3.0 output ports, it charges your devices 75% faster than ordinary mobile power. Compatible with all USB charging devices, including phones, tablets, cameras, and more, it is the perfect companion for all your charging needs.

Equipped with a multifunctional LED light, this jump starter serves as an emergency tool with three working modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe. The super bright LED lights provide convenience and safety during night use, making it ideal for camping, outdoor activities, emergencies, and travel.

With your purchase, you will receive the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, jumper cables, a USB-C cable, a cigarette lighter converter, a carry case, and a user manual. Plus, our professional 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you. Please note that no adapter is included, but any USB type charger for your cell phone can be used to charge the jump starter.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day - get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter and experience the power and convenience you deserve.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger

Description: Our AVAPOW 4000A Jump Starter is a Supersafe and reliable automotive jump starter offering the users maximum power. This jump box has a 4000A peak current. You can use it to start 10.0L diesel engine and any gasoline engines in a few minutes. The 4000A Peak 12V car battery pack jumper booster comes with 88Wh high capacity and portable battery charger.It designed with 27800mAh and two USB charge ports. This automotive battery jumper pack can be used anywhere for its compact body.It is equipped with type-C input and output, which enables it to supports type-C charging USB. The other outstanding thing about this best battery jump starter for the large engine is its ruggedness and super security. This jump starter cables are all made of metal clamps to prevent them from breaking in the long run.

POWERFUL & LARGE CAPACITY - AVAPOW car jump starter provides up to 4000 peak current, 27800mAh capacity can start all 12V cars (Including hybrid power), motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, snowmobiles, etc. easily in just a few minutes. (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel) - up to 40 times on a full charge.

INTELLIGENT PROTECTION - With intelligent protection systems such as short circuit, low battery, high temperature and reverse connection. The jumper clamp is designed to be sturdy and durable, and the cable of sufficient length is more convenient to use. The jumper box has a prompt indicator and a buzzer to indicate correct operation.

UPGRADED FAST CHARGING - Not only a lithium car starter, but also a portable car power supply with a high capacity of 27800mAh. It uses dual USB 3.0 output ports (USB 1: 5V /3A 9V /2A 12V /1.5A; USB 2: 5V / 2.4A and the Charging speed is 75% faster than ordinary mobile power. Compatible with almost all USB charging devices, including mobile phones and tablets, cameras, kindle, etc.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL LED LIGHT - This car battery jump starter features three working modes of built-in light (flashlight/SOS/strobe), which can be used as an emergency tool. Super bright LED lights provide more convenience for night use. This multifunctional flashlight is perfect for camping, outdoor, emergency, travel, etc.

WHAT YOU GET - 1 X Portable Battery Starter,1 X Jumper Cables,1 X USB-C Cable, 1 X Cigarette Lighter Converter, 1 X Carry Case,1 X User Manual, and professional 24-hour online after-sales team for any issue. Tips: No adapter included (All your cell phone USB type charger could be used to charge the jump starter.).
